content.rendered:
Q4 Highlights

Q4 rounded off an exciting year at Source.

Here’s a quick update on the last quarter, including our Dubai trip highlights, a case study and a photo or two from the Source Christmas party.

You can also join the waitlist for our exclusive new investor feature, launching soon.

As always, please contact us if you have any further questions or queries.

Launching Soon

We've been working on an exclusive feature to showcase our investment opportunities, which will be going live very soon.

Want to be the first to take a look around?

Join the waitlist be notified when its live.

Predictions For 2024

We can’t predict the future. What we can do is combine our expertise, research and experience and give you our predictions for the property investment market in 2024.

Read the full blog post here.

Dubai Trip

In November, Tom, Ollie and Chris visited Dubai.

During their visit, they met clients and professionals across the property industry, attended some brilliant networking events and even squeezed in a round of golf.

They will be returning to Dubai in April next year before meeting with clients in India and look forward to seeing everyone again.

Case Study: Shepherds Quay

Shepherds Quay is a waterfront development in North Shields.

We launched the site off-plan to clients in 2021. Located at the doorstep of a major £140m regeneration scheme, offering high-quality apartments and uninterrupted river views, we quickly identified the strength of this opportunity.

Clients that reserved through Source were able to benefit from preferential pricing. We secured the best units with the lowest capital entry points, offering the most potential for capital growth.

Since completion in 2022, properties purchased at values of £225,000 in the scheme have sold for up to £260,000. Furthermore, we have seen gross yields rise to hit as much as 7.6%. With rents increasing up to 15.8%.

For more information on similar available developments, contact us here.

Christmas Party

We celebrated the festive season with an evening out in London.

After a quick drink in Soho, we had a bite to eat and a round of crazy golf in Oxford Street. The evening ended with cinnamon scroll doughnuts (we all recommend!).

Pictured below: Ollie (left) and Chris (right) showing us their putting skills

 

That's all for now.

Please get in touch with the team to discuss our new property investments.  

 
Contact Us
